sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper MSFT SQL Instance
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT tblSqlServers.sqlServerId , tblASsets.AssetID , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , 'Resource' AS Category , 'Database' AS Subcategory , tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments
, tblSqlServers.dataPath AS config_directory , tblSqlServers.installPath AS install_directory , CAST(tblSqlServers.sqlServerId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(tblSqlServers.AssetID AS VARCHAR) AS CorrelationID , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblAssets.Mac)), '') AS Parent_CorrelationID , tblSqlServers.skuName AS edition , tnetwork.DNSDomain , tblAssets.Firstseen AS FirstDiscovered , tblAssets.Lastseen AS MostRecentDiscovery , tblSqlServers.IsClustered AS is_clustered
, tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus
, tblSqlServers.version AS [version] , tblSqlServers.displayVersion AS [version_name] , 1 AS InstallStatus , tblAssets.AssetName + CASE WHEN COALESCE(tblSQLServers.InstanceName, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE '\' + COALESCE(tblSQLServers.InstanceName, '') END AS [Name] , tblAssets.AssetName + CASE WHEN COALESCE(tblSQLServers.InstanceName, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE '\' + COALESCE(tblSQLServers.InstanceName, '') END AS [short_description] , COALESCE(tblSQLServers.InstanceName, '') AS InstanceName , tblSQLServers.spLevel , tblSQLServers.serviceName ------------ , 'MSFTSqlInstance' AS SourceName , CASE WHEN tblComputersystem.Domainrole IS NULL THEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename WHEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename = 'Windows' AND tblComputersystem.Domainrole > 1 THEN 'WindowsServer' WHEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename = 'Windows' AND tblComputersystem.Domainrole IN (0,1) THEN 'WindowsPC' END AS ParentAssetType
, tblAssets.AssetName AS ParentName , tblAssets.Mac AS ParentMACAddress , tblAssetCustom.Serialnumber AS ParentSerialNumber , 'Runs on::Runs' AS RelationType
FROM tblSqlServers INNER JOIN tblAssets ON tblSqlServers.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssetCustom ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState on tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tblNetwork.AssetID , tblNetwork.IPAddress , tblNetwork.Description , DefaultIPGateway , DNSDomain , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AssetID ORDER BY Description ASC) AS tNetworkRowNo FROM tblNetwork WHERE tblNetwork.IPEnabled = 1 and tblNetwork.DHCPenabled = 1 /* check this */ and (tblNetwork.DefaultIPGateway IS NOT NULL OR tblNetwork.DNSDomain IS NOT NULL) ) tNetwork ON tblAssets.AssetID = tNetwork.AssetID INNER JOIN tsysAssetTypes ON tsysAssetTypes.AssetType = tblASsets.AssetType LEFT OUTER JOIN tblComputersystem ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblComputersystem.AssetID WHERE -- multiNics were causing duplicates tNetworkRowNo = 1
